data.title: Bertrade DE MONTFORT
data.text:
Family Links

Spouses/Children:

1. Hugh OF KEVELIOC 3d Earl of Chester

Alice (Agnes) OF CHESTER+

Bertrade DE MONTFORT

Born: Cir 1155

Marriage (1): Hugh OF KEVELIOC 3d Earl of Chester in 1169

Died: Cir 1227 aged about 72

General Notes:

Bertrade de Montfort was born circa 1155. She was the daughter of Simon III de Montfort, Comte d'Evreux and Maud (?).

She married Hugh of Kevelioc, 3rd Earl of Chester, son of Ranulph de Gernon, 2nd Earl of Chester and Maud fitz Robert, in 1169. She died circa 1227.

Children of Bertrade de Montfort and Hugh of Kevelioc, 3rd Earl of Chester

Hawise of Chester, Countess of Lincoln+ d. c 1242

Matilda of Chester+ b. 1171, d. 6 Jan 1233

Mabel of Chester+ b. a 1171

Ranulf de Blundeville, 4th Earl of Chester2 b. c 1172, d. c 27 Oct 1232

Alice of Chester+ b. c 1174, d. 2 Nov 1247

Bertrade married Hugh OF KEVELIOC 3d Earl of Chester, son of Ranulf DE GERNON 2nd Earl of Chester and Maud FITZ ROBERT, in 1169. (Hugh OF KEVELIOC 3d Earl of Chester was born about 1147 in Kevelioc, Merionethshire, Wales, died on 30 Jun 1181 in Leek, Staffordshire, England and was buried in St. Werburg's, Chester, Cheshire, England.)
